channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 长期以来，在旧金山或纽约这样的城市工作，工人可以获得很大的薪酬优势。现在，大城市的优势正在缩小。
item.description:
Workers have long gotten a large salary advantage by working in a city like San Francisco or New York. That big-city premium is now shrinking. https://t.co/C7Pb8Gzsf9 https://t.co/C7Pb8Gzsf9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 2016 年的胜利改写了候选人的社交媒体游戏规则。萨沙-伊森伯格（Sasha Issenberg）写道，民主党人仍在奋力追赶。
item.description:
Donald Trump’s 2016 victory rewrote the social media playbook for candidates. Democrats are still scrambling to catch up, writes Sasha Issenberg. https://t.co/ovAERqiGLz https://t.co/ovAERqiGLz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/niv03pafnh https://t.co/niv03pafnh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 回顾：HBO 纪录片《狮心王》回顾了印第安纳波利斯 500 赛事冠军丹-惠尔登（Dan Wheldon）的职业生涯和 2011 年的致命车祸，并在他的妻子和孩子决定自己参加赛车比赛后对他们进行了跟踪报道。
item.description:
Review: HBO documentary "The Lionheart" examines the career and fatal 2011 crash of Indianapolis 500 champion Dan Wheldon, and follows his wife and children after the youngsters decide to pursue racing themselves https://t.co/XZ6Lk4nVog https://t.co/XZ6Lk4nVog

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: "自由之声》导演 Alejandro Monteverde 携《卡布里尼》回归，影片讲述了弗朗西斯卡-卡布里尼在 19 世纪末离开意大利前往纽约，并成为第一位被封为圣徒的美国公民的故事。
item.description:
"Sound of Freedom" director Alejandro Monteverde returns with "Cabrini," a film about Francesca Cabrini, who left Italy for New York in the late 1800s and became the first canonized American citizen https://t.co/sLMxIqaeeh https://t.co/sLMxIqaeeh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 他们住在谷仓里，奶牛不断踩到地雷，90% 的邻居都不在了。但这些乌克兰村民发誓要在俄罗斯占领的恐怖之后重建家园。
item.description:
They live in barns, their cows keep stepping on land mines and 90% of their neighbors are gone. But these Ukrainian villagers vow to rebuild after the horrors of Russian occupation. https://t.co/7xZvEBVieC https://t.co/7xZvEBVieC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：乔-拜登（Joe Biden）需要一个制胜的议题来挽救他陷入困境的竞选。@TressaPankovits写道：幸运的是，他有一个公立学校选择的议题，如果能在国情咨文中突出这一议题，他将受益匪浅。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Joe Biden needs a winning issue to save his struggling campaign. Fortunately, he has one in public school choice and would benefit from spotlighting it in his State of the Union address, writes @TressaPankovits. https://t.co/AxbuMRd2Ey

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024

item.title: 让开，让开。新的地方恩怨是板球。美国各地的城市都在考虑为这项运动修建体育场馆，这引发了反弹和混乱："板球？就像在英格兰一样？为什么？
item.description:
Move aside pickleball. The new local feud is over cricket. Cities across the U.S. are weighing stadiums for the sport, sparking pushback and confusion: “Cricket? Like in England? Why?” https://t.co/lfEeGF9hDS https://t.co/lfEeGF9hDS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 8, 2024
